title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When trying to add a localization key, it is not possible to leave the key blank. This causes the externalized text to not be displayed in the chart.
OB: After leaving the key blank in the properties file, the text is still valid and should be displayed in the chart title.
EB: However, the text is not displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, please follow these steps:
1. Set the externalized text in the chart title.
2. Leave the key blank in the properties file.
